title: Ticket #1577: Directory path failing because of trailing slash
description: While testing a fix for #1576, noticed that if there was a trailing slash in the path being sent in through -l, Condor was unable to use that path. Fix is to run the path through the condor_dirname function, which checks for a trailing slash and removes it.
